item.title: From Zero to Eye Diagram: Building a Full SerDes Model in Minutes with MATLAB
item.description:
Introduction

For anyone diving into high-speed interface design, the complexity of SerDes (Serializer/Deserializer) modeling can be overwhelming. However, MATLABâ€™s built-in SerDes Toolbox has changed the game, making it incredibly accessible for beginners and efficient for pros.
